pullrequest.title: add pause and unpause, reorganize order of custom scripts used for atlas vehicle interactions.

content.raw:
It improves the enter and exit car actions taken during the following tutorials:

http://gazebosim.org/wiki/Tutorials/drcsim/2.0/VRC_Plugin_Golf_Cart_With_Atlas

http://gazebosim.org/wiki/Tutorials/drcsim/2.0/VRC_Plugin_DRC_Vehicle_With_Atlas
